description: The Russian opposition figure is being treated in Berlin after falling ill on a flight on Thursday.
title: Alexei Navalny: Putin critic 'probably poisoned' - doctors
title_page: Alexei Navalny: Putin critic 'probably poisoned' - doctors - BBC News
maintext: July 2019: He was sentenced to 30 days in prison after calling for unauthorised protests. He fell ill in jail and doctors said he had suffered an acute allergic reaction, diagnosing him with "contact dermatitis". His own doctor suggested he might have been exposed to "some toxic agent" and Mr Navalny said he thought he might have been poisoned.
